DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess safety , tolerability , pharmacokinetics different dose regimen Ceftaroline
DOC.brief_title: A Study Assess Safety , Tolerability Pharmacokinetics Ceftaroline Healthy Subjects
DOC.detailed_description: A Phase I , Single Centre , Randomised , Double-blind , Placebo-controlled Parallel Group Study Assess Safety , Tolerability , Pharmacokinetics Ceftaroline Different Intravenous Dose Regimens Ceftaroline Fosamil Healthy Subjects
DOC.criteria: Provision sign date , write informed consent prior study specific procedure include optional safety biomarker analysis Healthy male female subject age 18 55 year ( inclusive ) suitable vein cannulation repeat venipuncture Women childbearing potential must negative pregnancy test , nonlactating , use highly effective form birth control 1 month prior enrollment , study , 3 month completion studyrelated proceed Have body mass index ( BMI ) 18 30 kg/m2 weigh least 50 kg 100 kg Has receive another new chemical entity ( define compound approve marketing ) participate clinical study include drug treatment within 3 month first administration investigational drug History clinically significant disease disorder , opinion Investigator , may either put subject risk participation study , influence result subject 's ability participate study Any positive result screen serum hepatitis B surface antigen , hepatitis C antibody , human immunodeficiency virus ( HIV ) History presence gastrointestinal , hepatic , renal disease condition know interfere absorption , distribution , metabolism , excretion drug Any clinically significant abnormality physical examination , 12lead ECG , vital sign , judge Investigator
